turns.userPrompt:
Create a dashboard homepage:
- Backend: API endpoint for dashboard stats: GET /dashboard
  - Total tasks, completed tasks, overdue tasks, tasks by priority
  - Recent activity (last 10 task updates)
- Frontend: Dashboard page with:
  - Stats cards showing key metrics
  - Pie chart of tasks by status
  - Bar chart of tasks by project
  - Recent activity feed
  - Quick actions (Create Project, Create Task)
- Use Chart.js or Recharts for visualizations
